FuncDef: The display srv6-te policy group last-down-reason command displays records about events where SRv6 TE Policy groups go down.
CLIs: display srv6-te policy group last-down-reason [ endpoint <ipv6-addr> color <color-value> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the endpoint of an SRv6 TE Policy Group.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Specifies the color value of an SRv6 TE Policy Group.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 4294967295.

Examples: Down Reason          : No active SRv6-TE Policy
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display srv6-te policy group last-down-reason command displays records about events where SRv6 TE Policy groups go down.
